donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
The project aims at supporting a sector wide and comprehensive legal sector reform in Zanzibar and capacity building support to institutions which are key to drive the legal sector reform.

The following outputs are expected to be achieved under the project:
• Legal Sector Reform Strategy developed and implemented
• Enhanced institutional and operational support of legal sector institutions
• Strengthen access to legal aid for the most vulnerable
• Justice system is enabled to handle children's cases and respond to the needs of child victims, witnesses and offenders

project_descr: The project proposes to support a sector wide and comprehensive sector reform in Zanzibar and capacity building support to institutions which are key to drive the legal sector reform.
